title: I made an open source Windows app to rewind and search everything on screen
dot: digraph RewindApp{rankdir=TB;newrank=true;node[shape=box, style=filled, color=lightblue];UserExperience[label="User Experiences Memory Challenges:     - Difficult to remember where info is seen    - Info spread across many sources"]; Problem[label="Problem:     - Hard to find past information    - Information might get lost"];Inspiration[label="Inspiration:     - Rewind Mac App    - Black Mirror S1E3"];OpenSourceApp[label="Open Source Windows App:     - Rewind & search screen content    - Locally stored memory, non-alterable, and private"];Implementation[label="Implementation:     - Uses ffmpeg & screenshots    - OCR API & image embedding    - Local web UI Interface"];Features[label="Features:     - Ignore specific programs/screens    - Search by text, window titles, image description    - View screen times, generate summaries"];Privacy[label="Privacy:     - All operations local to user device    - No cloud involvement"];OpenSource[label="Open Source:     - Built with Python    - Transparent & modifiable    - Free, no subscriptions"]; Challenges[label="Challenges:     - Not a polished product    - May have performance issues    - Transparent data handling"]; Future[label="Future & Community Input:     - Encouraging contributions    - Open to discussions & improvements"];RewindApp[label="Rewind App\n(Windows)", shape=ellipse, color=lightgreen];RewindApp->UserExperience;RewindApp->Problem;Problem->Inspiration;Inspiration->OpenSourceApp;OpenSourceApp->Implementation;Implementation->Features;Features->Privacy;OpenSourceApp->OpenSource;OpenSourceApp->Challenges;Challenges->Future;}
